Articles.Content:
Post a sentence, then next person replies to that post. the OP\'s job is then to edit the original post so as to make the reply funny, awkward, or even just plain wrong. The more ambiguous the answer, the better! I\'ll start:

How would you describe Snooki?

A green, delicious, moist paste that is made of avocados.

How do you eat a traffic cone?

With a giant spork and lots of pepper. That stuff\'s really rubbery!

How do you fix a computer?

With a chainsaw, revved to full speed.

How do you deliver a baby?

With explosions, lots of explosions.

How do you tutor a student in mathematics?

With a stick.

How do you steer a truck?

With your tongue and butt

How do you make someone laugh?

By tickling them

How do you get the color pink mad?

Break a Pinkie promise.

Describe a mouse with one adjective.

Wet.

How do you screw in a light bulb?

By screwing it in(i know this is gonna be good!)

How do you save the world from getting destroyed?

Duct tape and a prayer.

Who is the worst doctor in the world?

Who?

How do you create potassium?

Spam 'k' like there\'s no tomorrow.

How do you sneak into 1950\'s Russia?

By sneaking and whispering a lot. With a bowl of borscht.

What did your mother say when you tried to go back home?

Know the secret password.

How to stop Justin Bieber from singing?

tranquillize it

in the bedroom, what do you do?

Smash the lander up with a heavy stick!

A little timer appears in the corner of your screen while playing CoD, and the timer says: 'Nuclear bomb inbound'.

What do you do?

Consume it, cause it\'s tasty.

I\'m in your computer, watching your Internets....what do you do?

Go to www.kerbalspaceprogram.com

What if crossing the Medwedian Border?

Hope you won\'t get raped by a large bear.

When doing an art project in school?

IT IS RAINING PAINTS FORM THE CEILING!

When landing next to the strange black monument thing on the Mun.

Go f*** Yeah.

when leaving a plane lavatory with a girlfriend?

Umm sir... why are you opening the door? We\'re still flying...

While coding a game.

FYI, you need to edit your post so that it becomes awkward, guys.

Tap that sucker!

How do you remove a building?
